thread.title: BRIEF-Green Dot Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.23

title: BRIEF-Green Dot Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.23
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Green Dot Corp:
* GREEN DOT REPORTS RECORD-SETTING FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
* SEES FY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.81 TO $2.88
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 * SEES Q1 REVENUE $295 MILLION TO $300 MILLION * SEES FY REVENUE $982 MILLION TO $997 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $213 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.25, REVENUE VIEW $206.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.61, REVENUE VIEW $988.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $293.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
